interests.name: Dubi's Accessories
interests.description: Quality and satisfaction is our major. We offer an exclusive collection of fashion-forward accessories that complement every outfit and occasion, from everyday casual to elegant events.

interests.name: Thia's Lips and Accessories
interests.description: Keep your lips smooth and sexy. Our products are infused with nourishing ingredients, offering bold colors and long-lasting hydration — a must-have for every beauty enthusiast.

interests.name: Zoe’s Fashion World
interests.description: Your hub for urban fashion trends. From streetwear to statement pieces, Zoe’s offers curated styles that blend comfort with confidence — fashion designed for the bold and stylish.

interests.name: NextGen Electronics
interests.description: Affordable gadgets for everyone. We bring cutting-edge tech to your fingertips — from smart devices and wearables to home electronics — all at budget-friendly prices.

interests.name: Soma Cakes
interests.description: Fresh and healthy meals for a better you. Specializing in custom cakes and pastries made with organic ingredients, Soma Cakes blends delicious taste with guilt-free indulgence.

interests.name: Dera's Foodstore
interests.description: Books that inspire and educate. Beyond groceries, we offer a handpicked selection of cookbooks, nutrition guides, and resources that empower healthier and smarter eating choices.

interests.name: Prime Bookstore
interests.description: Books that inspire and educate. Discover literary gems, academic texts, and creative stories that spark imagination and support lifelong learning in every reader.

interests.name: Black Musicals
interests.description: Books that inspire and educate. Explore a curated collection of musical histories, biographies, and sheet music celebrating Black excellence in sound, rhythm, and storytelling.
